new-cap.description:
Description

This rule requires constructor names to begin with a capital letter. Certain built-in identifiers are exempt from this rule. These identifiers are:

- Array
- Boolean
- Date
- Error
- Function
- Number
- Object
- RegExp
- String
- Symbol
- BigInt

Examples ofcorrectcode for this rule:

/*eslint new-cap: "error"*/

function foo(arg) {
    return Boolean(arg);
}
